transcript: I've been trying to mold this through my head to figure out when the point was when we took a turn from the worst and I can't seem to pinpoint it.

segments.text: I've been trying to mold this through my head to figure out when the point was when we took a turn from the worst and I can't seem to pinpoint it.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I've been turning this thing over in my head trying to figure out when the point was when we took a turn for the worse, and I can't seem to pinpoint it.
